title: Phoenix crossbow

properties.name: description
properties.value: The Phoenix crossbow is a quest item, although it can be traded. It has the same stats as a regular Crossbow, but weighs significantly less. It can be obtained and is used in the quest Shield of Arrav. The Phoenix crossbow has no requirements to wield, and can only fire bronze bolts.

Phoenix crossbow

Advanced data
Item ID767

The Phoenix crossbow is a quest item, although it can be traded. It has the same stats as a regular Crossbow, but weighs significantly less. It can be obtained and is used in the quest Shield of Arrav. The Phoenix crossbow has no requirements to wield, and can only fire bronze bolts.

The Phoenix crossbow is not often used, as the Bronze crossbow requires the same Ranged level to equip, but gives a Ranged accuracy of +18, whilst the Phoenix crossbow only gives +6. However, the Phoenix crossbow is essentially free, and since Bronze crossbows and above are members-only items, the Phoenix Crossbow is the best crossbow available to free-to-play players, on par with the standard Crossbow.

Changes[edit | edit source]

Date Changes
7 July 2021
(update)

The weapon's position on female players has been adjusted so that they appear to be equipped properly.

8 April 2020
(update)

The Phoenix crossbow now has an "Inspect" option which tells players how to give it to an ironman player.

13 October 2014
(update)

Players can now use the Phoenix crossbow on another player to transfer it.

29 May 2007
(update)

The item was graphically updated with the rework of Shield of Arrav.
